messages.subject: John Taylor Gatto is speaking in Houston
messages.msgSnippet: HOUSTON SUDBURY GROUP PRESENTS JOHN TAYLOR GATTO Former New York State Teacher of the Year, Author of The Underground History of American Education and Dumbing
messages.messageBody:
HOUSTON SUDBURY GROUP PRESENTS

JOHN TAYLOR GATTO
Former New York State Teacher of the Year, Author of The Underground
History of American Education and Dumbing Us Down: The Hidden
urriculum of Compulsory Schooling

The title of his talk is "The Trapped Flea Principle and Other
Weapons of Mass Instruction"

January 14, 2006, 1:00 pm
The United Way Center
50 Waugh Dr. Houston, TX

Tickets are $15.00 ($16.00 online) & available through the Houston
Sudbury Group at http://www.houstonsudbury.org

For more information call (713)880-2489 email nfo@....

There is also a small reception with Mr. Gatto at the school, 1330
Heights Blvd. at 7:00 pm the same night. Tickets are $100 and going
fast.
